articles.title: Earthcare cloud mission launches to resolve climate unknowns - BBC.com
articles.description: Europe's Earthcare satellite will tell us if the planet could lose the cooling effect of clouds.
articles.content:
Jonathan Amos,Science correspondent, @BBCAmos
Artwork: It's taken fully 20 years to get Earthcare into space 
A sophisticated joint European-Japanese satellite has launched to measure how clouds in… [+5530 chars]
